Name: VSActivity
Title: RS VS - Activity at Time of Incident
Descriptino: Activity at time of incident (prefer SNOMED CT).

Name: VSBitesAgent
Title: RS VS - Bites/Stings Agent
Descriptino: Type of animal/insect/plant causing bite or sting; use LOINC code where provided in mappings.

Name: VSBurnDegrees
Title: RS VS - Burn Degrees
Descriptino: Burn degree/severity (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th) as mapped from ONEISS/CSV (SNOMED CT).

Name: VSDrowningType
Title: RS VS - Drowning Type/Body of Water
Descriptino: Type/body of water for drowning incidents.

Name: VSGCSEyes
Title: RS VS - GCS Eyes
Descriptino: Glasgow Coma Scale eye opening responses (LOINC LA codes).

Name: VSGCSMotor
Title: RS VS - GCS Motor
Descriptino: Glasgow Coma Scale motor responses (LOINC LA codes).

Name: VSGCSVerbal
Title: RS VS - GCS Verbal
Descriptino: Glasgow Coma Scale verbal responses (LOINC LA codes).

Name: VSInjuryIntent
Title: RS VS - Injury Intent
Descriptino: Injury intent options mapped from ONEISS (prefer SNOMED CT).

Name: VSLevelOfConsciousness
Title: RS VS - Level of Consciousness (AVPU)
Descriptino: AVPU options for level of consciousness (prefer SNOMED CT).

Name: VSModeOfTransport
Title: RS VS - Mode of Transport to Facility
Descriptino: Mode of transport to the hospital/facility.

Name: VSOtherRiskFactors
Title: RS VS - Other Risk Factors
Descriptino: Other risk factors at time of incident (prefer SNOMED CT).

Name: VSOtherVehicle
Title: RS VS - Other Vehicle in Collision

Name: VSPatientsVehicle
Title: RS VS - Patient's Vehicle
Descriptino: Vehicle used by patient (prefer SNOMED CT; local additions where specified).

Name: VSPlaceOfOccurrence
Title: RS VS - Place of Occurrence
Descriptino: Place of occurrence (prefer SNOMED CT; local additions where specified).

Name: VSPositionOfPatient
Title: RS VS - Position of Patient
Descriptino: Position/role of patient in transport incidents (prefer SNOMED CT).

Name: VSStatusAliveDetail
Title: RS VS - Alive Detail (Consciousness)
Descriptino: If alive on arrival: conscious vs unconscious.

Name: VSTransportAccidentMode
Title: RS VS - Transport Accident: Land/Water/Air
Descriptino: Exposure context for transport accident: land, water, air (ICD-11).
